Articles.Content:
<p><img alt="image" src="http://media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_mxk2ciax7Z1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57988-WIP-0-22-x-RealChute-Parachute-Systems-parts-and-real-drag%21-v0-3-1-4-12-13"><img src="http://media.tumblr.com/805b96584f4210c60ed2788214670894/tumblr_inline_mxkbhefNd31rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p>stupid_chris wants you to land safely and do so in a more realistic fashion. That’s why he presents <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57988-WIP-0-22-x-RealChute-Parachute-Systems-parts-and-real-drag%21-v0-3-1-4-12-13"><strong>RealChute Parachute Systems</strong></a>. The depth and detail of the items in this mod are simply first class. Seriously, just look at this list:</p>

<ul><li><strong>Gradual deployment</strong></li>

<li><strong>Completely reworked deployment clauses</strong></li>

<li><strong>Parachutes on the ground</strong></li>

<li><strong>Parachutes return to staging</strong></li>

<li><strong>New type of parachutes</strong></li>

<li><strong>Fully customizable</strong></li>

<li><strong>Two parachutes on one part</strong></li>

<li><strong>Custom parts</strong></li>

<li><strong>Vessel hangs from the parachute</strong></li>

</ul><p>Do you love parachutes? Do you <em>really</em> love parachutes? Then <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57988-WIP-0-22-x-RealChute-Parachute-Systems-parts-and-real-drag%21-v0-3-1-4-12-13"><strong>RealChute Parachute Systems</strong></a> is a must-have in your game.</p>

<p></p>

I've been using this mod for a while, and helped find a little bug regarding deployment clauses (don't worry, it's fixed!), and it really works great! Look like he finally got some new part meshes, I'll have to go get the update

Edited December 10, 2013 by User Unrelated
I'm rather fond of this mod myself, and it's clear that the developer has put quite a bit of effort into making it both realistic and functional. Most impressive work, stupid_chris
Should be STOCK! I love it
Definitely should be stock, tired of G-loads on Kerbal when the chutes deploy, hope gradual deployment will be implemented this update or 0.24

Should be STOCK! I love it

Beat me to it. At least I miss being able to deploy stock parachutes on the ground to slow planes down.
This mod is really great! Maybe it should be considered for inclusion into the base game in the future
this mod seems pretty interesting, mabye I should try it out
Already using that one, it's a must-have (especially "flat" 2-in-1 chutes).

I've looked at this mod a while ago, and I see a lot of development has taken place. They've gotten new models for their parachutes, and it looks a lot more polished. Great job stupid(or not so much)chris!
devs, I know I shouldn't ask but can this please be made stock...?

It`s the Real(chute) Thing!

I have decided to use these chutes in KerPollo 7. The four different parts for the three types of chute are great. I`ve only used two of the twelve and now I want to make the craft that will need to use the rest...

I must admit to some fear when they opened for the first time. I have become so used to the situation where if you don`t stop straight away then you are going to lithobrake that the gradual deployment is something to which I am still getting familiar.

Wouldn`t do without them now.

I have reduced my Mod list from dozens including ones that did all sorts of things (kethane, mechjeb, KIDS, KMP, KAS etc) to just a few that don`t do much except free up craft design and give `essential` features and info. Stretchy tanks, procedural fairings, editor extensions, RCS Build aid, engineer redux, selectroot, enhanced NavBall, KOS and of course RealChutes.

All of these are mods I would be happy seeing in Stock. Like Subassembly Loader, a mod no longer...

Well done Stupid Chris.
